mods.name: BeatLeader
mods.details:
Records and posts replays to https://beatleader.xyz/ and shows in-game leaderboards.
Used star values from BeatSaver and linear PP curve. All modifiers are enabled!

You need to sign up in mod settings before you can post replays. Just enter a username and password.
The profile will be created after the first score is posted!
You can use any login, not only the oculus one, and migrate to steam or change your avatar on the website.

Changelog:
- Updated to 1.21.0

Not implemented yet:
- In-game replay viewer
- In-game user profile viewer
- Score statistic viewer(only pp and accuracy right now)

Your replays are located at /ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/bl/replays and you can watch them on https://replay.beatleader.xyz/

Send bug reports and suggestions to BeatLeader Discord(link on the website) or ping @NSGolova or @Christoffyw somewhere. We'll try to fix them ASAP.
creator: NSGolova

Have you ever wanted a cube to play with? Or maybe more than one? Well, with this mod you can have as many as you want, wherever you want. You can make them pause for you, crash your game, become modern art, or just be fun to cut.

The original idea for this is the PC mod PauseCoob, created by Goobwabber: https://discord.com/channels/441805394323439646/889894313763422218/895121405388144680
Along with multiple requests in mod-requests that made me think of making this something more.

mods.name: ParticleTuner
mods.details:
A partial port of the Particle Overdrive mod from PC with colorful sparckles and custom parameters including ambiend dust.

Features

* De/Activate Core particles
* De/Activate Clash effects
* De/Activate ambiend dust
* De/Activate Rainbow sparkles
* Customizable amount of sparkles
* Customizable amount of explosion particles
* Customizable duration of explosions and sparkles effects
* Customizable transparency of explosions and sparkles
creator: Marcus Zhou
Mioki

creator: EnderdracheLP#2305
LookAtHippo#1213

mods.name: MultiQuestensions
mods.details:
Lightweight port of MultiplayerExtensions, the PC mod that adds features to official Multiplayer.

Features:
- Lets you play Multiplayer with Custom Songs between PC and Quest.
- Automatically downloads songs when missing.
- Shows a loading indicator that shows how many players have the song downloaded and are ready
- Shows a downloading indicator when downloading songs you're missing
- Shows a platform icon for each player
- Has a download history in the GameplaySetupMenu (GameplaySetupMenu is sometimes a bit buggy)
- Auto-Delete Toggle to automatically delete songs that were downloaded in Multiplayer after playing them.
- Lag Reducer Toggle that hides notes/bombs and walls from other players. (Specifically useful when playing ME maps)
- Lets you select a custom color for your platform and name tag for everyone to see.
- Increases the Max Players amount for Lobby creation to 10.
- Disabled Avatar Pose Restrictions, you can freely walk over to others if you so desire.

Warning: This mod is still not fully stable and you may experience issues such as crashes when playing with others. 

Other incompatible mods:
Chroma versions below v2.5.7
Discord Presence v0.3.5 and below

Requires: Beat Together Mod post in this channel https://discord.com/channels/441805394323439646/885555565760237598/909500373465698355
creator: EnderdracheLP and Goobie

mods.name: Note Vortex
mods.details:
It's back and it's not broken this time!

Ever wanted notes bigger than the sun? No? Well here you go anyway!

A very simple mod that has options for:
     - world rotation that rotates your world by 1 degree every time a note spawns (Credit to Phish, his guide is lower down)
     - A fun note effect that causes notes to spawn beneath you and swirl upwards.
     - A multiplier for your note size, allowing you to make the notes bigger than the sun or smaller than your brain!
creator: AllyPallyUK

mods.name: RumbleMod
mods.details:
Allows you to adjust controller haptic feedback.
Quest re-port of the PC mod with the same name by nalulululuna

The mod is disabled by default, please go to the Mod Settings menu to enable.

 What's New? 
- Rewritten the mod
- Implemented a shitty hooking system (as per usual)
- Made UI very close to the PC version
- Updated to 1.17.1

 Known Issues: 
- "The rumble buttons stop rumbling the controller after pressing one of the rumble buttons, exiting the RumbleMod menu, and then going back in the menu", this will be fixed, as soon as I can find the issue
creator: Millzy
SuperMarcus
nalulululuna

mods.name: AikaTweaks
mods.details:
Features:
- Clean and easy to use UI.
- Bloom! Enhance your Quest's visuals, with PC-like graphics.
- Change resolution and refresh rate in-game! No need for SideQuest.
- Graphics Presets! Pick from over 4 pre-defined presets (Default, Quality, Bloom and Power Saving), specifically tuned for your Quest.
- CPU/GPU levels adjustment. Squeeze more performance out of your Quest!

The "Bloom" option in "Graphics" is hidden until you set a preset for the first time, this is to prevent idiots from complaining about bloom being laggy and not using the graphics preset.

TIP: Did you know? If you use a Quest 2 and enable the 120 Hz experiment, you can use 120 Hz inside Beat Saber!
creator: Aika
xyonico

downloads.notes:
ChromaLite is included in here
- Using new regex engine (yoinked by Aero, this beat PC before. I had to mention it ;3)
    - 15 Sublimit load time: 3 minute -> 0.4 ms 
- Bumped Tracks (lots of bug fixes)
    - Fix point defs with number array (e.g [3,5,7])
- Fixed point definitions with colors
- Fix explicit light id environment enhancement not working properly
- Ported many bug fixes from upstream PC
- Support multi-tracks
- Optimized many areas related with environment enhancements, lighting and obstacles
- Fix multiplayer crash (requires unreleased MQE build)
- Added option to disable note coloring
- Added a profiler to environment enhancements (Mappers, feel free to use this to improve your map's performance please!)
    - Pst, there's a hidden config value on Quest, similar to PC ;) /sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Configs/Chroma.json
- Chroma logs are at: /sdcard/Android/data/com.beatgames.beatsaber/files/logs/Chroma_WhateverVersionItIs.log

This update is on par with Chroma 2.5.7, including the fog. However, it does not incorporate the new light 2.0 system changes by BeatGames; this will be on the 1.19+ release.

- Things that haven't been ported:
- Force Zenwalls (I was too lazy to do this, maybe some other day)

 Needs testing
- Chroma in Multiplayer (requires new unreleased MQE build)

mods.name: Tweakaroo
mods.details:
Tweakaroo is a "compilation" of minor changes/modifications to the game

Developed by Myself and BoopetyDoopety 

ALL Features are Toggleable

Features:
- No Names - Removes the Artist/Mapper Name for the Pause Menu.
- I'm Not Interested - Removes the DLC Promo in the Main Menu.
RGB Menu - Allows you to change the colour of Menu Environment Objects.
- Void Menu Environment - Removes the Menu Environment, turning it into an Abyssal Void.

- Settings UI

Examples and Descriptions of all Tweaks can be found here: 
https://github.com/MillzyG/QuestTweakaroo/blob/main/README.md

Please Submit Requests and Issues here:
https://github.com/MillzyG/QuestTweakaroo/issues
creator: MillzyG

downloads.notes:
Bug Fixes:
- Did it crash when you tried joining someone in Multiplayer? Yeah I fixed that, very sorry for it again, (blame me for copy pasting my own code).

Coming in 1.4.0:
- Option to Offset Clock Position
- Option to Change colour
- Battery Indicator will change colour according to charge
- General Code Tweaks
- More?

Changelog:
- Changed versioning from MAJORER.MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH to MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH

Bug Fixes:
- Clock should now align properly with the Multiplayer Lobby Menu (not tested for Quick Play or joining per code, works when hosting though). Tell me if anyone is experiencing issues even after the patch.
- Battery Percentage should now always display correctly.

Changelog:
- Added Headset Batterycharge Indicator, can be toggled on in the options, off by default.
- Added Option to change FontSize (default: 4).
- Tweaked General Clock Position.
- Tweaked HoverTooltips for the Settings.
- Changed Clock Position for the Multiplayer Lobby.
- "Show During Song" will now be on by default.

Notes:
- Temp Fix for the clock position in the multiplayer lobby (set for someone of a height of 1.80m for now), apparenty the windows adjusts based on your height, I'll work on a better solution asap.

I'm very sorry for the issues this could have caused any off you.

Known Bugs:
- Battery Percentage can show 52.999996% instead of 53/52%

Missing Features:
- Change color.
- Change Position.

Note by ComputerElite:
Please check your versioning! https://semver.org/

Changelog:
- Added Headset Batterycharge Indicator, can be toggled on in the options, off by default.
- Added Option to change FontSize (default: 4).
- Tweaked General Clock Position.
- Tweaked HoverTooltips for the Settings.
- Changed Clock Position for the Multiplayer Lobby.
- "Show During Song" will now be on by default.

Missing Features:
- Change color.
- Change Position.

mods.name: Fast Fail
mods.details: Speeds up the fail animation!
creator: gabriella

downloads.notes:
Known Bugs:
- Failing a mission will crash your game, however it wont because I disabled the hook. Meaning there is nothing to worry about! This will be fixed in the next update.

mods.name: InstaFailAccuracy
mods.details:
InstaFailAccuracy allows you to set a certain accuracy threshold that if you go below, you will fail the level! All of these can be changed through a simple in-game GUI too!

Known bugs:
- Your game will crash if you watch a replay that includes you dying to going below your accuracy threshold.
creator: gabriella

mods.name: Third Person Mod
mods.details: View yourself in 3rd person while playing. Features include a spinning camera, flying through the whole beat saber environment and way more
creator: ComputerElite

downloads.notes: Library update

Changelog:
- You can now fix your camera to your any of your hands. (You can also apply the offset you specify for the normal third person camera)
- You can move the camera now while you are playing by holding Y (there is a multiplier in the settings for the speed)
- You can now only apply the position and not the rotation (will most likely reduce motion sickness)
- Third person mod can now be disabled while viewing replays due to Replay having it's own camera system (please note that this is part of the full replay mod. This won't work right now)

Changelog:
- Did you notice those objects which just suddenly disappeared? I fixed that.

mods.name: Particles
mods.details:
Quest Particles allows you to boost/reduce/remove note slash particles, saber clash particles, remove environmental dust, and make particle rainbow.

This mod does nothing out of the box. You will need to use the in-game mod config UI (Settings -> Mod Settings -> ParticleTuner) to change the particle behaviors.

Known Issues:
* Particles having white tints in rainbow mode (colorOverLifetime?)
* Sometimes the preset buttons may fail to work (please lmk if you can reproduce this issue consistently)
creator: Marcus Zhou

downloads.notes:
Known Issues:
* Particles having white tints (colorOverLifetime?)

Changelog:
- Added a mod settings page
- Made it more stable

mods.name: Custom Pillows Quest
mods.details:
This mod is a spiritual port of the mod for PC of the same name by Toni Macaroni!
These pillows can be anything you want them to be, as long as you can put it on a flat texture. This mod was Commissioned by @TKC 

 - Pillows Take their texture from a pool of active textures, enabled in the mod settings and listed from sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/CustomPillowsQuest/images
 - Pillows spawn using a constellation, configured in the mod settings and located at sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/CustomPillowsQuest/constellations
 - The mod can be disabled in the menu
 - Features a shuffle button in the menu for shuffling the current iteration of textures

Extra Pillow Textures:
https://github.com/RedBrumbler/CustomPillowsQuest/releases/latest/download/ExtraPillows.zip
creator: RedBrumbler

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
 - Allow any image type to be loaded, not just png
 - Pillows now get a texture, not a sprite loaded (speed up)
 - should crash less often as pillows now only spawn AFTER being loaded instead of assuming they are loaded, also they are being loaded later after any scene changes

mods.name: Clock Mod
mods.details:
Features:
- Toggle Clock off in maps.
- Change Clock between 24/12 Hour format.
- Toggle Seconds on/off
- Added HoverText explanations to the config menu.

Missing Features:
- Change size
- Change color

Note:
Since the original source code only had the code to show the clock, I had to rewrite things like changing the format to 12 from 24 hours and toggling seconds on and off.
Which means any previous config values will not load. You will have to set the settings again.

mods.name: Practice Skipper
mods.details: Adds the ability to seek and change song speed while in practice mode. Double tap left or right with your left controller's analog stick to skip through the song, and double tap up or down to adjust the song speed. Options are available to change which controller to use, how long to skip, and how much to change speed.

This is an updated/refactored version of the mod originally made by L_, and should hopefully be easy to update in the future.

mods.name: Replay Lite
mods.details:
OUTDATED: USE REPLAY INSTEAD.

 Lets you view your replay of your best attempt or score on a song. Replays can be sped up or slowed down and paired with death replays (the replays that show on the level failed screen), this can be an excellent practice tool. View your death replay and slow it down a lot to see exactly why you died.

Full replay will still take a while but I am definitely making progress.

My Patreon (If you join then you get some perks): https://www.patreon.com/henwill8?fan_landing=true
creator: Henwill8

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- FIXED CRASHES IN MULTI, YOU NO LONGER SHOULD HAVE TO DISABLE REPLAY TO PLAY MULTIPLAYER
- Now saves your best attempt on a song and tells you when you died on it.
- In the level failed screen you can now choose to replay that specific play.
- Added option to never save no fail plays.
- Added feature to change the song time in the pause menu (so you can now skip around and see different parts easier).

mods.name: PauseConfirm
mods.details:
Makes you confirm before going back to the menu, restarting or pressing continue when in the pause menu. This is to avoid you accidentally doing it when you're about to set a really good play, which I'm sure you've all done many times.

To choose which buttons require confirmation go to the Settings Icon in the main menu -> Mod Settings -> PauseConfirm. The default is that all three buttons require confirmation, but some might not want that.
creator: Laurie

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- Updated for Beat Saber 1.13.2.
- Updated all libraries.

mods.name: SlowResume
mods.details:
Allows you to change how long the countdown takes to resume when paused. Disables score submission if the amount of time is increased, since this makes pausing an easier method to get back your stamina.

To change the amount of time, go to the Settings Icon in the main menu -> Mod Settings -> SlowResume.

This mod was commissioned
creator: Laurie

mods.name: RandomEndless
mods.details:
Features:
-Random song button, when clicked it will select a random song from the current playlist.
-Endless button, when clicked it will play all valid songs in the playlist back to back.
-A bunch of settings for both Random and Endless, configurable from the Mod Settings UI in game.

OST/DLC songs are not currently supported because I cba.
Some songs won't have valid song paths, meaning endless can't find and load them, if there are songs you want to play in endless but have invalid song paths the only thing you can do is delete and reinstall them from beatsaver/beastsaber. If you have PinkCore it should tell you if a song has an invalid path.
If a song is OST/DLC or has an invalid path endless will skip it.

If you have any bug reports or feature requests DM L_#8786.
creator: L_

mods.details:
QuestSounds or QSounds for short, allows the user to change sounds without asset mods,

Features:

  Creates QuestSounds folder at /sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/
  AFTER YOU HAVE RAN THE MOD ONCE
  Config for disabling and enabling Custom Sounds!
  Custom filepaths in config, so you can decide where you want the sounds!

Planned features:
- Settings Menu to select Sounds.
- More Sounds to customize

mods.name: Discord Presence
mods.details:
Allows discord rich presence to see which song you're playing, the current time, and much more.

Mod Installation: https://github.com/Lauriethefish/Quest-Discord-Presence-Client/blob/main/README.md
You must follow this to set up the client on your PC and the mod on your Quest.
If you get a virus warning during installation, ignore it, this isn't a virus - Windows is oversensitive.

Alternatively, follow this guide to use MadMagic's app for general presence of any Quest app: https://github.com/madmagic007/Oculus-Quest-Presence

If it's not working, try these:
- Make sure your Quest IP hasn't changed, if so, update it in the app, see installation.
- Make sure you've opened the app.
- Make sure Beat Saber is open and your headset is on your head.
- You have discord on your PC not in the browser.
- Try restarting discord.
creator: Lauriethefish#6700

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- Added support for showing the time elapsed in the main menu and in multiplayer lobbies.
NOTE: This requires an update of the client, linked below.

Changelog:

- Updated all libraries.

mods.name: Qosmetics
mods.details: Quest Cosmetics on a whole new level!
creator: RedBrumbler

downloads.notes:
- Some changes in handling of replacing making it a bit faster in theory
 - Add disabling to API, allowing any mod to disable Qosmetics elements if they conflict 
 - Manual disabling added too, don't want Qosmetics to do anything with notes? you can disable that :)

Adds a list of donators and patrons in the main qosmetics view controller, which is a reward for the top 3 tiers of the patreon page and one time paypal donators in the following order:

- Legendary patron
- Amazing patron
- Enthusiastic patron
- paypal donator
If you want to donate, follow these links:

Find the Patreon page here https://www.patreon.com/Qosmetics
Only want to donate once? paypal works too! https://paypal.me/RedBrumblerOfficial?locale.x=nl_NL

mods.name: PinkCore
mods.details: PinkCore, formerly known as PinkUtils is a core mod that ports over many required features which ensures a smooth PC-Like experience.
creator: Pink
StackDoubleFlow
Lillie
RedBrumbler

downloads.notes:
New Features/Bug Fixes
- In-Game Patreon supporter recognition via a button on the Noticeboard.
- Requirements are now per-difficulty. (If a map has a non-Noodle difficulty, you can now play that difficulty again)
- Fixed NoteProcessorClampPatch which ensures Mapping Extensions compatibility. (thanks Stack)
- Requirements API using env vars.

New Features/Bug Fixes
- Fixed soft locking when you edit the OST packs.
- All map previews will now show, fixing any infinitely loading maps.
- Maps will showcase their mod requirements if you have any missing.
- You will be unable to play a map without its required mods.
- The NoticeBoard has now been moved to the right hand side.
- New network error message for the leaderboards.
- IN GAME CONFIG UI!

mods.name: ModList
mods.details:
Allows you to see which mods have loaded correctly ingame, and tells you why a mod failed to load. Useful for support and troubleshooting.

To view loaded mods, go to the settings icon in the main menu, then select mod settings and go to mod list.
creator: Laurie

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- Updated all libraries.
- Updated for Beat Saber 1.13.2.
- Decreased text size to fit more mods left to right.
